name: Delaweare
description: The independent video game Delaweare is a free ZDoom based first person shooter in which the emphasis is put on visual and audio experiences. The aim of the game is to explore its strange world to collect all music tracks. The game was created by visual artist space is green in cooperation with musician Delaweare from Zoology Records. It features tracks from Delaweare's EP INIT. Additional resources and support were provided by Rabotik.
